attributes.action: Remove homework from all British schools
attributes.additional_details: Because it takes away social time and causes stress
attributes.background: Remove homework completely and use homework as a punishment

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637387
Ban homework except for GCSE coursework

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634817
Ban homework in schools apart from core/GCSE subjects.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636943
Ban primary schools from setting homework
